title: Install manifest format version 2
description: A manifest keeping track of the installed locations of dotpkgs

version.description: The version of the install manifest.

installs.description: The installed dotpkgs, keyed by the relative paths to the source directories (containing the dotpkg.json manifests).

targetDir.description: The installation path of the dotpkg.

srcPaths.description: The paths of the linked-to/copied files.

paths.description: The paths to the installed links.

sha256sums.description: The SHA256 checksums of the installed files. Mainly relevant for copy packages.
